title: RHONY alum Kelly Bensimon and Southern Charm's Whitney Sudler-Smith exchange flirty messages
text:
An exchange on social media between Kelly Bensimon and Whitney Sudler-Smith got Bravo fans speculating the two are romantically involved.

After the Southern Charm star and executive producer posted a photo to his Instagram showing him at the US Bank Stadium in Minneapolis, the Real Housewives Of New York alum responded with a flirty message.

In the caption of his post, Sudler-Smith, 51, referenced his upcoming shoulder surgery taking place at the Mayo Clinic in Minnesota.

Bensimon, 51, responded with a series of heart emojis prompting Sudler-Smith to reply: 'Can’t wait for you to nurse me after.'

Flirty messages: An exchange on social media between Kelly Bensimon and Whitney Sudler-Smith on Sunday got Bravo fans speculating the two reality stars are romantically involved

Sending love: Sudler-Smith referenced his upcoming surgery to which Bensimon responded with heart emojis prompting Sudler-Smith to reply: 'Can’t wait for you to nurse me after'

It's not the first time that the pair have commented on each other's Instagram posts.

However, reps for the two reality stars told People Tuesday that the relationship between them is platonic.

'They have been good friends for years,' Bensimon’s rep told the publication.

According to a rep for Bravo, 'They’re old friends and not dating.'

'Old friends': Reps for the Southern Charm star and producer and the Real Housewives Of New York alum told People Tuesday that the relationship between them is platonic

Bensimon, 51, is divorced from fashion photographer Gilles Bensimon, 75; they split in 2007 after a decade of marriage.

The exes share share daughters Sea Louise, 21, and Thadeus Ann, 19.

She appeared on RHONY seasons 2, 3 and 4.

Sudler-Smith is the son of wealthy socialite Patricia Altschul who is often seen on his reality show that is filmed in and around Charleston, Southern Carolina.
